channel.title: Data Science on Kshitijaa Jaglan
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science on Kshitijaa Jaglan

item.title: Twitter Visualisations
item.description: Generated a corpus of over 11,000 tweets using Python and Tweepy with required error handling for rate limits etc. Aggregated and analyzed the data in the form of a Streamlit webapp showing various coorelations between different tweet metadata while ensuring an easy-to-use interface.
